definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
foot (unit of length equal to 0.3048 m)
to be almost within reach/to be close at hand
square foot (unit of area equal to 0.093 m²)
to drool (over) (idiom)/to yearn for/to covet/to crave
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile

sentences.english: When wrist flexion simulated, the frequency of action potential waveform of median and ulnar nerve was higher.
sentences.chinese: 模拟腕屈时以正中神经和尺神经电位频率略高。

sentences.english: Install dipstick and verify it is seated in the tube.
sentences.chinese: 安装引擎机油尺并确认它安放在管中。

sentences.english: The Chinese women over here wouldn't touch a smelly Indian with a 10-foot pole.
sentences.chinese: 中国女人不会靠近臭哄哄的印度人10尺之内。

sentences.english: The deep to feet up, clam basket.
sentences.chinese: 极深者至四五百尺，拾蚌篮中。

sentences.english: Raise your sail one foot and you get ten feet of wind。
sentences.chinese: 撑起一尺的风帆，你会得到10尺的风力。

sentences.english: Can Calibrate and calibrate data will be saved automatically.
sentences.chinese: 可校准水平尺，并会自动储存。

sentences.english: Frame body of Non- chromed plated, unless otherwise stated, chromed -plated can be made for frame.
sentences.chinese: 尺框上平面一般不镀铬，客户要求可镀铬。

sentences.english: His father is 6ft 2in - I"d check the milkman."
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲有6尺2寸，我要去查查那个送牛奶的。

sentences.english: It is necessary to differentiate the syndrome from the ulnar nerve entrapment.
sentences.chinese: 需要和尺神经卡压症相鉴别。

sentences.english: He could see the spiders leering down at him from their fifteen-foot height.
sentences.chinese: 他注意到两只蜘蛛从十五尺的高度向他望来。

sentences.english: Install dipstick and verify it is seated in e tube.
sentences.chinese: 安装引擎机油尺并确认它安放在管中。

sentences.english: Buffett: In addition to the 67 feet cube, more gold is produced.
sentences.chinese: 在67立方尺之外，更多的黄金被产出。

sentences.english: Prior to Yao, players over 7'4" were usually one-dimensional freaks.
sentences.chinese: 在姚之前，超过7尺4寸的球员往往都是“一招鲜”。

sentences.english: Yao wears this mantle of fame quite well on his massive 7 foot 6 inch frame.
sentences.chinese: 然而，姚用他7尺六英寸的身躯很好的扛了起来。

sentences.english: The shortest are about 65 feet, or 20 metres, high.
sentences.chinese: 最矮小的钻机则只有65尺或20米高。

sentences.english: Metals are better heat radiators than wood.
sentences.chinese: 木尺比金属尺含有较多热。

a (10 meter) square/a square of given side
variant of 周長|周长[zhou1 chang2]
handle or shaft (of an axe etc)/(of a flower, leaf or fruit) stem/sth that affords an advantage to an opponent/classifier for knives or blades
